name: Spin' Click'
description:
Welcome to Spin, a game!

Instructions ・hit the spacebar or tap/click when the circle is touching the line. make sure you don't do it when it's not touching, or else you'll lose! try to get the highest score you can!

Notes ・this is inspired by pop the lock, an arcade game! 

Credits ・
Coded by FlankoTanko!
Art by: Squidy-IceCream

FEATURES:
Scoreboard
Gamepad Supported (Limited!)
Full Mobile Support!
Smooth Framerate! (Interpolation)
Linux and Mac support! 

(WILL RECIEVE SOME UPDATES!)

(I mark this as my FINAL scratch game before I move to other game engines)
